item.description:
Join the Two Ravens Kindred Winternights gathering and honor the Alfar
Over 30 heathens currently expected to attend from CT and surrounding states!

Date: Saturday November 14, 2009
Location: Kinswoman Patty's house in New Haven, CT
Arrival: 2:00 PM (hang out, rub elbows, have fun, play kubb if the weather's up for it)
Pre-Ritual Discussion: 5:00 PM
Blot: 6:00 PM
Pot Luck Feast follows Blot
Sumbel follows Feast

Discussion will focus on our male ancestral dead (the Alfar) - our memories of them, their stories, what they mean to us today. Please bring an item (if you have one) that represents/reminds you of your alfar - these items will NOT be offered in sacrifice but will be gathered together to form the ancestor altar. We will write their names in the Ancestor Book, and the names will be read out as part of the ritual.

IMPORTANT:
Two Ravens Kindred has a "vouch safe" policy for anyone who has never been to one of our private events before. In order to vouch for you, we need to meet for coffee/tea/beer first (or given that only a week remains and I'm dealing with a transportation snag, at LEAST have a decent phone conversation beforehand).

So if you are interested, then don't delay... call or email soon as possible.

Wassail,
Mike
(203) 870-5389
item.how_to_find_us: (fictitious address... call or email for directions and additional info)

group.name: Connecticut & Western Mass Asatru Meetup Group

item.name: TRK Midwinter/Alfar Blot
